tool_description: This is one of the largest collection of FM Radios API from around the world... Listen Updated 79,000+ Radio stations. All the Stations are Updating Daily & Weekly basis, New stations are Adding As soon as possible. At least 100+ Stations Are adding and 1000+ Stations are fixing to this API Weekly (This is minium ratio).
name: Radio World - 75,000+ Worldwide FM Radio stations..
title: Radio World - 75,000+ Worldwide FM Radio stations..
tool_name: Radio World - 75,000+ Worldwide FM Radio stations..

api_list.name: getAllQuotes
api_list.description:
You will get all the quotes here based on.
- limit
- page

api_list.name: getStationByCountry
api_list.description:
Getting all Stations by country based on.
- country id
- limit
- page
- order

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Ascending/Disascending order. (use only ASC or DESC)

api_list.name: getHomePage
api_list.description:
*We have made an option for you to display result in your landing/home page. So you don't have to work hard to achieve this.*
Get limited radios to show in landing/home page, based on.
- limit

api_list.name: getAllStation
api_list.description:
You will get all recent stations  here, based on.
- limit (integer)
- order (string)
- page (integer)
- random (boolean)

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Ascending/Disascending order. (use only ASC or DESC)

api_list.name: searchStation
api_list.description:
Search Radio station by keywords.
- keyword = radio name, country name
- limit = item limitation per page ***default 10***
- page = page number to be displayed ***default 1***
- order = order by ASCENDING/DISASCENDING  *(use only ASC or DESC)* ***default ASC***

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Display item by Ascending or Disascending order

api_list.name: getAllCountry
api_list.description:
Get all countries Name based on.
- limit
- page
- order

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Item limitation per page. (default is length.value of countries array. here is 500 max)
